5#include "cydstd/logging.hpp"
6#include "tools/tasks.h"
7#include <deque>
8#include <vector>
9
10using namespace cydui::threading;
11using namespace std::chrono_literals;
12
13logging::logger logger =
14 {.name = "TASKRUNNER", .on = true};
15
16std::mutex task_queue_mtx;
17std::mutex timer_list_mtx;
18typedef std::vector<cydui::tasks::_timer_t*> timer_list_t;
19typedef std::deque<cydui::tasks::task_t*> task_queue_t;
20
21static timer_list_t timer_list;
22static task_queue_t task_queue;
23
24static void add_timer(cydui::tasks::_timer_t* timer) {
25 timer_list_mtx.lock();
26 if (std::find(timer_list.begin(), timer_list.end(), timer) == timer_list.end()) {
27 timer_list.push_back(timer);
28 }
29 timer_list_mtx.unlock();
30}
31
32cydui::tasks::_timer_t* remove_timer(cydui::tasks::_timer_t* timer) {
33 timer_list_mtx.lock();
34 auto t = std::find(timer_list.begin(), timer_list.end(), timer);
35 cydui::tasks::_timer_t* t_ret = *t;
36 if (t != timer_list.end()) {
37 timer_list.erase(t);
38 } else t_ret = nullptr;
39 timer_list_mtx.unlock();
40 return t_ret;
41}
42
43static void push_task(cydui::tasks::task_t* task) {
44 task_queue_mtx.lock();
45 task_queue.push_back(task);
46 task_queue_mtx.unlock();
47}
48
49static cydui::tasks::task_t* pop_task() {
50 task_queue_mtx.lock();
51 cydui::tasks::task_t* id = nullptr;
52 if (!task_queue.empty()) {
53 id = task_queue.front();
54 task_queue.pop_front();
55 }
56 task_queue_mtx.unlock();
57 return id;
58}
59
60static void task_executor(cydui::tasks::task_t* task) {
61 if (task->reset()) {
62 task->exec();
63 // TODO - There should be a specific event for task completion
64 cydui::events::emit<RedrawEvent>({});
65 }
66}
67
68static void trigger_executor() {
69 timer_list_mtx.lock();
70 for (auto &item: timer_list) {
71 auto now = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch();
72 auto* timer = item;
73 if (!timer) continue;
74 auto* task = item->task;
75
76 //logger.debug("Found one count=%d, task=%X", timer->count, task);
77 if (timer->count != 0 && task && (timer->run_now || now - timer->last_time > timer->period)) {
78 timer->last_time = now;
79 timer->run_now = false;
80 if (timer->count > 0) timer->count--;
81 timer_list_mtx.unlock(); // NOTE - this is on purpose
82 task_executor(task);
83 timer_list_mtx.lock();
84 }
85 }
86 timer_list_mtx.unlock();
87}
88
89static void taskrunner_task(thread_t* this_thread) {
90 while (this_thread->running) {
91 auto task = pop_task();
92 if (task) {
93 task_executor(task);
94 }
95
96 trigger_executor();
97
98 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::duration<int, std::nano>(10ms));
99 }
100}
101
102cydui::threading::thread_t* taskrunner_thread;
103struct thread_data {
104
105};
106thread_data* taskrunner_th_data = new thread_data;
107
108void cydui::tasks::start_thd() {
109 if (taskrunner_thread && taskrunner_thread->native_thread != nullptr)
110 return;
111 logger.debug("Starting taskrunner");
112
113 taskrunner_thread =
114 threading::new_thread(&taskrunner_task, taskrunner_th_data)
115 ->set_name("TASKRUNNER_THD");
116}
117
118void cydui::tasks::start(task_t* task) {
119 start_thd();
120 push_task(task);
121}
122
123void cydui::tasks::start_timer(_timer_t* timer) {
124 start_thd();
125 add_timer(timer);
126}

129// TYPE IMPLEMENTATION
130
131cydui::tasks::task_id cydui::tasks::task_t::get_id() {
132 return this->id;
133}
134
135bool cydui::tasks::task_t::exec() {
136 this->task_mutex.lock();
137 if (!this->running) {
138 this->progress = 1;
139 this->running = true;
140 this->task_mutex.unlock();
141 this->main();
142 this->task_mutex.lock();
143 this->progress = 100;
144 this->running = false;
145 this->task_mutex.unlock();
146 return true;
147 } else {
148 this->task_mutex.unlock();
149 return false;
150 }
151}
152
153bool cydui::tasks::task_t::reset() {
154 this->task_mutex.lock();
155 if (!this->running) {
156 this->progress = 0;
157 this->running = false;
158 this->task_mutex.unlock();
159 return true;
160 } else {
161 this->task_mutex.unlock();
162 return false;
163 }
164}
165
166void cydui::tasks::task_t::set_progress(int p) {
167 this->task_mutex.lock();
168 this->progress = p;
169 this->task_mutex.unlock();
170 cydui::events::emit<RedrawEvent>({});
171}
172
173int cydui::tasks::task_t::get_progress() {
174 this->task_mutex.lock();
175 int p = this->progress;
176 this->task_mutex.unlock();
177 return p;
178}
179
180bool cydui::tasks::task_t::is_running() {
181 this->task_mutex.lock();
182 int r = this->running;
183 this->task_mutex.unlock();
184 return r;
185}
186
187bool cydui::tasks::task_t::is_complete() {
188 this->task_mutex.lock();
189 int p = this->progress;
190 int r = this->running;
191 this->task_mutex.unlock();
192 return p > 0 && !r;
193}
